section.para: This screen have 3 tab button All, bought, sold. "All" = bought and sold, "bought" = this account is buyer, "sold" = this account is seller. All item in the list can leave message to buyer and seller multi action that mean each item is seperated. If item is bought it have 3 options to select and then when select "Positive", "Neutral" and "Negative" a rating section appear,add rating to seller, and comment, if select "I'll leave Feedback later" a rating section disappear. If item is sold it have 2 options to select and then when select "Positive" a comment box appear to add comment text to buyer, if select "I'll leave Feedback later" this comment box will disappear.

section.title: Note :
section.para: If you don't add comment in text box, leave feedback don't send.
